amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 3007 of the bill which creates a special eligibility standard for asylum applicants who claim persecution on account of an accusation of involvement with a guerilla, militant, or terrorist organization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 108-751 to strike section 3007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 219 (Roll no. 518).
